Reviews.Title: “Pleasantly surprised”

Reviews.Content: downtown seattle expensive stay husband found hotel 80 plus tax queen beds free wireless adequate breakfast included eggs waffles service quick courteous arrived assigned loud female laughter coming adjoining quick visit front desk secured quiet clean linens quality pleased clean quiet downtown seattle reasonable price highly recommend hotel
